title: Hot & sour Thai prawn soup with jasmine rice

ingredients.item: 2 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Thai Red Curry Paste
350g pack frozen essential Waitrose Cooked And Peeled Prawns, defrosted

instructions.step: Cook the rice according to pack instructions.
Meanwhile, place the stock, vinegar, soy sauce, sugar and curry paste in a large saucepan and bring to a simmer.

Stir the prawns and mangetout into the pan and cook for 2–3 minutes until piping hot. Ladle into 4 bowls and scatter over the coriander leaves and most of the salad onions. Divide the rice between side bowls, scatter over the sesame seeds and the remaining green slices of salad onion, and serve alongside the soup.
